summary.body: Hi Does anyone have a supply of spare Barbican light switches? Or, does anyone know where to buy one? Or, failing that, has anyone successfully repaired one?? (the rocker has stopped working). Thanks!
summary.subject: Replacement light switches

summary.body: I am refurbishing at the moment and I wondered if anyone knew how to clean up the original Barbican light switches and sockets.
summary.subject: Light switches

summary.body: Hello A few of the switches in my flat are either on their way out (some light switches) or have died completely (light switch in the kitchen for the over-hob lights).  Has anyone else had this problem and does anyone know how I can go about getting them replaced? Thanks
summary.subject: Failing switches
